definition: that/those/then (in that case)/commonly pr. [nei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing
(idiom) no sooner said than done/before you know it
pinyin: shuo1 shi2 chi2 , na4 shi2 kuai4

sentences.english: By then tens of millions of people will have taken ezetimibe.
sentences.chinese: 而那时，数千万的人已经服用了ezetimibe。

sentences.english: He healed then, so He heals now.
sentences.chinese: 他那时医治了，所以他现在也会医治。

sentences.english: I probably did the wrong thing.
sentences.chinese: 那时，我可能做了件错事。

sentences.english: From thenceforward that bargain struck in child's play made me a free man.
sentences.chinese: 从那时起，在孩子的游戏中我们做成了交易，这。

sentences.english: At that time, most of the deans and teachers of the department are my teachers.
sentences.chinese: 那时系里的主任和教师大半是我的老师。

sentences.english: But the snag was that the Manchus were outnumbered by Han troops in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 但那时，北京的汉族军人数量已经超过了满族军人。

sentences.english: Then, real fast, I began tightening the man's shoelaces.
sentences.chinese: 说时迟，那时快，我开始系紧这个人的鞋带。

sentences.english: Since then, horses have only been used for ceremonial events or public relations.
sentences.chinese: 从那时起，马就只用于庆典或公关场合了。

sentences.english: The young people in Avonlea now are not what they were in our day.
sentences.chinese: 阿冯丽现在的年轻人和那时的我们不一样。

sentences.english: We only had about 20 people at that time.
His main complaint was that, at just three lanes, the M25 was not big or bold enough.
sentences.chinese: 他那时还抱怨说M25公路只有三车道，不够宽。

sentences.english: She was busy (in) learning computer then.
sentences.chinese: 她那时正在忙于学电脑。

sentences.english: Pangu open days soon, then, heaven and the earth is almost connected.
sentences.chinese: 盘古开天不久，那时，天和地差不多连着。

sentences.english: From then on, I worked hard to get into university.
sentences.chinese: 从那时起，我努力学校考大学。

sentences.english: I was 26 by then -- which is ancient for a male gymnast.
sentences.chinese: 我那时26岁，作为一名男子体操运动员已经太老了。

sentences.english: Although there are a lot of good time at that time, but also has a period of sadness long memory.
sentences.chinese: 那时虽有大把的好辰光，却也有一段忧伤漫长的记忆。

definition: in those days/then/in those years/during that time

that one/that thing/that (as opposed to this)/(used before a verb or adjective for emphasis)/(used to humorously or indirectly refer to sth embarrassing, funny etc, or when one can't think of the right word)/(used in speech as a filler, similar to "umm", "you know" etc)/(euph.) menstruation/sex/also pr. [nei4 ge5]
that/those/then (in that case)/commonly pr. [nei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing
